properties.displayName: Drop Binaries Into Spool Drivers Color Folder
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith ".dll" or FolderPath endswith ".exe" or FolderPath endswith ".sys") and FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the creation of suspcious binary files inside the "\windows\system32\spool\drivers\color\" as seen in the blog referenced below
